en-US.summary: A starter template for an Alexa audio streaming skill.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Pitch Drone for a B.
Alexa, ask Pitch Drone to give me a B.
en-US.name: pitch-drone
en-US.description:
****NOTE: During this first phase of testing the only note that works is B (we do not want to spend time in the studio until we are sure people like this first tone). At this point I am interested in what you think of the tone and what you think of the graphics. If your Echo device does not have a screen you can look at the home page in the Alexa app. 
 
 This skill plays the pitch you request in a natural tone. Instead of computer beeps the tone is played on a viola recorded in a studio, so it is easy to listen to has the overtones of a natural instrument. The tone will play until you tell Alexa to stop. 
 
 You can request any scale note. In addition to the utterances above, you can say things like: 
 
 Alexa, ask Pitch Drone to give me a C double sharp. 
 or 
 Alexa, ask Pitch Drone for an A440. 
 
 When finished, say: 
 Alexa, Stop 
 or: 
 Alexa, shut up
